definitions.definition: Without use or possibility to be used.
definitions.example: This fork has prongs that are bent. It's useless now.

definitions.definition: Unhelpful, not useful; pointless (of an action).
definitions.example: I think it's useless to keep this discussion going. It's like talking to a wall.
Bill never mows the lawn, takes out the trash or anything. He's useless, but I love him anyways.

definitions.definition: (of a person) Unable to do well at a particular task or thing. Useless is mildly insulting.
definitions.example: My brother is useless at most computer games, but he is an awesome PS2 player.
